SELECT A.ID , A.NAME , A.IN_CHARGE , A.DEPT , A.CALL_NUM , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.BUSINESS_NUM , A.ADDR , A.LAST_TRANSACTION , A.FIRST_CONTRACT_DATE , A.MEMO , A.STAR , B.NAME AS CHANNEL_NAME , C.NAME AS SEGMENT_NAME FROM customerlistCommandEntity A LEFT JOIN channel B ON A.CHANNEL_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN segment C ON A.SEGMENT_ID = C.ID
AND A.IS_DELETED = 'N'
AND A.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND A.EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
ORDER BY A.ID DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customerlistCommandEntity A
AND A.IS_DELETED = 'N'
AND A.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND A.EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')

SELECT A.ID , A.NAME , A.IN_CHARGE , A.DEPT , A.CALL_NUM , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.BUSINESS_NUM , A.ADDR , A.LAST_TRANSACTION , A.FIRST_CONTRACT_DATE , A.MEMO , A.STAR , B.NAME AS CHANNEL_NAME , C.NAME AS SEGMENT_NAME FROM customerlistCommandEntity A LEFT JOIN channel B ON A.CHANNEL_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN segment C ON A.SEGMENT_ID = C.ID WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.IS_DELETED = 'N'
